author: xtqqczze
body:
Contributes to #15110.

Fix [RCS1225: Make class sealed](https://github.com/JosefPihrt/Roslynator/blob/master/docs/analyzers/RCS1225.md)

Contains `internal`, `private` changes from 2069d92b3e2760ab631efbf12bbde9ca46e661e2 (#11773).

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: CodeFactor new `Complex Method` issues are false positives.
